@FibeIndia  I applied for a loan on Friday with a 10-min disbursal promise, but it’s been over 3 days. Customer care keeps saying 'end of the day' with no resolution. Why rely on NBFCs in emergencies if service isn’t prompt? Why advertise 10-min disbursal if you can’t deliver?
